m:content.em: Patient Data is usually associated with a traditional SQL or noSQL database

In this example data has been extracted, then losslessly loaded into the graph store. Zero, one, or more transformations can be performed on the graph to produce multiple variants of the transformation without damaging the source data.
Furthermore the same data can be accessed vi Excel, Tableau, PowerBI and many other reporting tools using the OData V4 RESTful interface.
m:content.h1: This examples captures information about patients.

ol.li: Users: (aka Agent) the subjects of the tests
Activities: (aka Activities) the activities peformed by the users one or more times
ActivityMeasurements: (aka Entity) the measured results of the patients performing that activity
